strIntroduction: 來到宜蘭不能錯過的點-冬山河，每年暑假的童玩節，是每個小孩心中最想要去的地方！來到傳統藝術中心，整個園區完全復刻台灣傳統的文化，在裡頭彷彿坐上時光機一樣回到以前的生活。
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Dongshan River and National Center for Traditional Arts in Yilan

strIntroduction: 位於台灣最南端的恆春半島及墾丁，充滿了驚豔的旅遊經典，有最專業的的導覽人員，帶您體驗不一樣的恆春半島及墾丁。 一人即可成行
strTitle: 1-day tour around Longpan Park, Eluanbi Park and Mobitou Park

strIntroduction: 到花蓮不用自己開車，由專業司機帶你包車遊太魯閣。太魯閣是個堅硬大理石山，經過千萬年，大理石如同被刀割一樣的被批成兩半！自然的傑作，侵蝕的結果。
strTitle: 1-Day Chartered Tour to Taroko National Park

strIntroduction: 澎湖黝黑、楮紅的玄武岩與藍天白雲相映的美景，以及得天獨厚的國際級金色沙灘，絕境美景不可錯過。
strTitle: Tour of the Penghu Islands (One-day tour)

strIntroduction: Wooden craft is the most natural and the most exquisite skill of all material creation. House will warm up immediately if the space is full of aroma of wood. Carpentry work focuses on delicate handmade and texture. By making your own wood chopsticks, you will know more about the intentions and patience of carpenters
strTitle: Handmade-Cypress chopsticks

strIntroduction: 由原住民朋友帶你走入部落，用朋友的角色到部落旅遊，以尊重的心去欣賞部落的美，用美學的角度去找尋部落的藝術，聽部落的故事、吃部落的美食、體驗部落的文化、一切由部落人引導。
strTitle: 【漫遊原住民園區】高雄琉璃吊橋一日遊

strIntroduction: 嘉義的新港奉天宮及北港朝天宮是當地人生活的重心，也是媽祖信徒此生必去的地方，讓kkday帶您深入探訪嘉義媽祖廟! 板頭社區有許多可愛交趾剪粘藝術，喜歡童趣、藝文的您千萬不能錯過~
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Fengtien Temple in Xingang and Chaotien Temple in Beigang

strIntroduction: 鹿皮溪的溪谷悠靜，特別是在陽光下會反射出淡淡綠光，清澈溪水沁涼無比阿！
strTitle: Yilan Nanaolupi Creek's Upstream Trek

strIntroduction: 在地專業車手，用重機的馬力壓縮舟車勞頓的時間，快速抵達目的地，享受在地風景與美食。
strTitle: A Unique Taipei Experience Motorcycle Day Trips
Neiwan Township (One-day Tour)

strIntroduction: 從台北出發，過了雪隧、走過頭城、抵達南澳，對宜蘭的印象似乎就是羅東運動公園與夜市，然而好山好水的蘭城村落，豈只是這樣而已？基於對家鄉的一份熱愛，宜蘭有許多漂鳥返鄉，耕耘自己的一方有機天地，此行三天兩夜的行程就跟著在地宜蘭人一起探索蘭城最美的村落風景。
strTitle: 【台北出發】宜蘭有機生活美學之旅

strIntroduction: KKDAY這次帶您深入美濃，體驗道地客家文化，包括菸樓、紙傘文化村、美濃窯，成為一日客家人~
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to the Meinong Paper Umbrella Culture Village

strIntroduction: 穿梭在戰場，沐浴在槍林彈雨中，體驗子彈呼嘯而過的刺激感，來成為戰地英雄吧!
strTitle: An indoor game of "Battle for Survival"

strIntroduction: 沿著全台最美麗的海岸線，到台東海岸線一日遊吧！跟著「八仙過海」的傳說來到三仙台造訪火山岩。直擊鹿野高台，東部著名飛行傘與熱氣球基地。欣賞不同風貌的台東。
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour Along the Taitung Coastline

strIntroduction: 當在國內旅遊或出國旅行、經商，面對各種不確定的環境因素，除了隨身行囊外，您投保旅行平安險了嗎？
strTitle: 【線上投保】台灣自由行旅遊平安險-投保金額500萬NTD （不限國籍）
Hot Spring Experience at Beitou Spring City Resort

strIntroduction: 只想要一個人輕鬆享受溫泉的療癒嗎？來到金湧泉SPA溫泉會館，推出露天風呂泡湯與御廚單人套餐，讓你自在沈浸套地金山湯泉與單人獨享套餐，此行程為2016溫泉美食嘉年華特別規劃。
strTitle: 【今宴北海岸】金湧泉SPA溫泉會館「露天風呂泡湯+御廚單人套餐 」

strIntroduction: 泰崗溫泉在秋冬之際，圍繞在旁的槭樹會染成一片火紅色，一邊享受熱泉冷溪時，還能一邊欣賞難得的美景~
strTitle: Hotspring and Upstream Creek Trek in Taigang, Xinzhu

strIntroduction: － 預約山泉源頭水蓮花田，見證超越自然農法培育方式，魚蓮共生的自然蓮田。 － 聽超級阿嬤獨立創造夢想有機村，老農現身分享追隨經過。 － 絲竹樂與文史家的絕妙蘭調，帶您穿梭宜蘭今昔的光陰隧道。
strTitle: 【有機生活美學】蘭城丟丟銅仔一日遊

strIntroduction: Green Island, a little gem right off Taiwan's east coast. This off-the-beaten-track dive destination is the perfect getaway for your next short holiday.
strTitle: Green Island Diving Trip

strIntroduction: 打比厝溪短短的溯程，就可體驗到溯溪所帶來的樂趣，適合親子一同享樂!
strTitle: Taian Dabicuo Creek's Upstream Trek in Miaoli

strIntroduction: Taiwan High Speed Railway 20% Discount e-ticket. Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Changhua

strIntroduction: 原住民風格的烏來老街，不但有舒服的溫泉，還有非常特色的烏來瀑布，晚上還可以散步碧潭，悠閒生活。
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Wulai hot springs and Enjoy the Night View in Bitan

strIntroduction: 詭譎的叢林裡，任何風吹草動，都有可能出現敵人蹤跡。打一場痛快的漆彈野戰，讓你感受持槍掃射、躲藏冒險快感就不用跑很遠就在台北市內！！
strTitle: Paintball Experience in Taipei's Forest (includes a barbecue lunch)

strIntroduction: 台中樂園一次玩到底，不同樂園不同主題，有刺激也有觀光，喚起不為人知的童心，快來重拾過去快樂、瘋狂的樂園回憶吧！
strTitle: Taichung Lihpao One Day Land Tour

strIntroduction: 專業教練帶您體驗潛水，享受海平面下的美麗風光，龍洞鼻頭角潛水體驗，就算是新手也能來喔，瑞芳車站-活動地點免費接駁
strTitle: Northeast Bitou's Half Day Diving Experience

strIntroduction: 最聰明的方式遊高雄，帶你去駁二特去、忠烈祠等，體驗在地高雄式生活，請選擇為你貼心準備高雄市區包車樂悠遊～
strTitle: 4-Hour Chartered Tour in Tainan

strIntroduction: 台北九份+野柳，用計程車導覽，專業司機家導遊，方便、安全又輕鬆。
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Jiufen and the coast of Yehliu

strIntroduction: Magnificent and holy Paper Dome owns a very meaningful story. Come to listen to its touching story!
strTitle: “Paper Dome” Taomi Paper Church, Puli one-day trip

strIntroduction: 體驗刺激重機，侯硐貓村悠哉風光遊覽，神秘礦坑地體體驗。
strTitle: 【重機微旅行】重機猴硐貓巡禮．4小時貓村樂活巡禮

strIntroduction: 用Taxi走不一樣的旅行路線！專業司機帶你帶玩翻宜蘭～
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Yilan
Zhaishan Tunnel, located at the site of the Great Victory of Guningtou Day Tour
Outdoor Hot Spring at Night for 2 in Spring City Resort

strIntroduction: 桃園機場出發，下飛機立馬衝熱門景點，。台中、清境、日月潭包車直達，最快、最方便、最省時！
strTitle: Transfer from Taoyuan Airport to Taichung, Cingjing and Sun Moon Lake

strIntroduction: 那羅溪是新竹在地人才知道的溯溪祕密基地，許多天然的滑水道都在這裡~
strTitle: Naluo Creek's Upstream Trek in Jianshi, Xinzhu

strIntroduction: 花蓮滿山遍野的金針花海（忘憂草），有夢幻湖之稱的雲山水，讓你煩惱跟憂愁頓時消失的一乾二淨。如果沒有煩惱，那就順道造訪由日治時期建造的慶修院，看看不同風貌的花蓮吧！
strTitle: 11-Hour Taxi Tour to Liushidan in Hualien

strIntroduction: 平時待在辦公桌前，很疲累吧?快來趟新北半屏溪之旅，找回那個充滿熱血的自己吧!
strTitle: Banping Creek's Upstream Trek in New Taipei

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Tainan High Speed Train Station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Tainan High Speed Train Station

strIntroduction: 出來玩就是要你放鬆，不要再為塞車所苦了！！ 宜蘭寓教於樂之旅，來宜蘭放鬆一下吧！
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour around Yilen King Car whisky distillery

strIntroduction: 墾丁及恆春充滿令人驚豔的特色景點。 帶您參觀台灣最具規模水族館，導覽人員帶您賞玩恆春半島西岸景色，並欣賞南台灣最美的關山夕照之浪漫景緻。
strTitle: Half-day tour around Mobitou Park and Aquarium in Kenting

strIntroduction: 每年秋冬至季，陽明山大屯山芒草🌾盛開，秋天氣候舒適，快來山上走走...
strTitle: 6-Hour Autumn Silver Grass Taxi Tour at Yangmingshan National Park in Taipei.

strIntroduction: 體驗新竹客家風，勤儉樸實，讓自己當一天的'哈嘎凜'
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Experience Hakka Culture and Customs in Hsinchu

strIntroduction: 如何親近大自然？答案是找！牛！去！親近大自然和動物互動，還能體驗手作的樂趣。還有另個方式，欣賞木雕，看藝術品與大自然的融合，成為一幅最真實的山水油畫。
strTitle: Miaoli Flying Cow Ranch One Day Tour, starting out from Taichung

strIntroduction: 龍洞岩場位於東北角海岸龍洞岬角， 是台灣最佳的天然攀岩場，因為岩場質地堅硬，適合攀岩，龍洞岬角成為知名的攀岩場！
strTitle: Rock Climbing, Cave and Cliff Exploration in Yong-dong

strIntroduction: 埔里豐年農場培養了許多香菇，除了採菇還可以烤菇，好玩又好吃的豐年農場絕對值得您走一遭! 而紙教堂在黃色的室內燈光下，呈現一片祥和之感，讓人感覺平靜溫馨。
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Harvest mushrooms at Fengnian Farm in Puli

strIntroduction: 曾經想過一覺醒來就能泡個美人湯嗎?讓花蓮鴛鴦溫泉二日遊滿足你的需求!
strTitle: 2-Day Yuanyang Hotspring and Upstream Creek Trek in Hualien

strIntroduction: 台東必遊景點：鹿野高台，熱氣球嘉年華初體驗！俯視台東美景。到泰源幽谷直擊台灣獼猴的真面目，看獼猴逗趣的模樣。
strTitle: 4-Hour Taxi Tour along the Taitung coastline or via the Taitung Valley

strIntroduction: 用Taxi走不一樣的體驗！追星族、童話族、還有泡溫泉族，一次都讓你滿足！
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to the Fairytale Park by the artist Jimmy in Yilan

strIntroduction: 來雲林就是要去喝「古坑咖啡」，不然要幹麻？當然 還有很多必去景點。到劍湖山世界來場「驚聲尖叫」。再順便去蜜蜂故事館，讓甜滋滋的蜂蜜來撫慰受驚嚇的心靈吧！
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Taiwan's Original Coffee Village, Get Addicted to Gukeng's Coffee

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Kaohsiung Zuoying High Speed Train Station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Kaohsiung Zuoying High Speed Train Station

strIntroduction: 黃金峽谷的巨石深潭、急流水瀑，是東部最美最原始的景觀，溪水澄澈的令人迷戀不已阿~
strTitle: River Tracing at Golden Grotto and Sanzhan N. River of Hualien

strIntroduction: 當在國內旅遊或出國旅行、經商，面對各種不確定的環境因素，除了隨身行囊外，您投保旅行平安險了嗎？
strTitle: 【線上投保】台灣自由行旅遊平安險-投保金額1000萬NTD （不限國籍）

strIntroduction: 結合腳踏車與獨木舟遊台北福隆，是親子戶外體驗的第一選擇。
strTitle: Canoe and Cycling Experience at Fulong, Taipei

strIntroduction: 宜蘭最好玩、最靠近大自然的景點，千萬別錯過~
strTitle: 3-Day culture and ecology trip to Taipingshan

strIntroduction: 對於台灣的機車文化感到好奇嗎？讓台北的重機騎士帶您體驗，台北的重機文化吧！
strTitle: 2-Hour Motorcycle Tour in Taipei

strIntroduction: 花蓮輕旅行．休閒半日遊。觀賞蓮花的爭奇鬥豔、來去立川魚場餵魚，療癒心靈。從七星潭遠眺清水斷崖，或是夜晚賞星辰，花蓮專屬風景！
strTitle: 5-Hour Taxi Tour in downtown Hualien.

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Taichung High Speed Train Station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Taichung High Speed Train Station

strIntroduction: 七孔瀑布是由七層不同的小瀑布所組成的，在攀岩與溯溪的過程中除了挑戰自我外，還能體驗大自然的奧妙~
strTitle: River tracing at Chikung waterfall in Kenting

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Miaoli High Speed Train Station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Miaoli High Speed Train Station

strIntroduction: 本行程結合美國大峽谷泛舟精神的極限要求，可以體驗翻船自救、船艇脫困等峽谷冒險，想挑戰自己的體能嗎?來試試看7HR大挑戰!
strTitle: Creek's Canoeing Experience in Xiugumi, Hualien

strIntroduction: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Off e-ticket, Save up time & money with our High-Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Taoyuan

strIntroduction: 慢活生活，慢生活在台北。三峽老街樂悠悠～
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Zushi Temple and the Old Street in Sanxia

strIntroduction: 麥巴來溪地處偏遠，加上之前封溪護魚政策的推行，鮮少人知道這般美麗的秘境，快來一探究竟吧~
strTitle: Maibalai Creek's Upstream Trek, Xinzhu

strIntroduction: 新竹季節限定企劃！！賞楓專車桃源仙谷，來逍遙遊一回吧！偶爾拋開煩惱，擁入大自然的懷抱吧。
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Tao Yuan Shien Valley in Hsinchu

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Yuanshan MRT station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Taipei Metro Yuan Shan Station

strIntroduction: 南投天空之橋動人景緻，美不勝收。台灣知名鳳梨酥品牌，開放參觀。驚人的鳳梨酥製作過程大解密，趕快來尋找微熱山丘的秘密。
strTitle: Half-day trip to Nantou Sky Lad

strIntroduction: 家庭旅遊量身打造~逛逛南天宮、白米木屐文化館，下午再去蘇澳冷泉spa，輕輕鬆鬆玩透蘇澳!
strTitle: One day trip to the Su'ao cold spring spa and a secrete beach (Lover's Cove)

strIntroduction: 直擊女王頭的鬼斧神工，由於侵蝕速度的增加，快把握時間來看吧！接著造訪九份，體驗山城的氛圍，還有一定要吃碗芋圓，順道走訪黃金博物館，感受昔日的淘金盛況吧！
strTitle: 9-Hour Taxi Tour to Queen’s Head Rock in Yehliu and Gold Rush in Jiufen

strIntroduction: 有試過在墾丁外海觀看岸邊的景點嗎? 有試過在船上直接跳入海裡的感受嗎? 有試過在海上觀賞夕陽沒落的瞬間嗎? 墾丁帆船體驗將帶領您一同嘗試新的感官及視覺刺激，也讓您感受貴賓級的服務及待遇。
strTitle: Top-notch sailboat experience in Kenting

strIntroduction: 秋天-適合逛街的日子不熱也不冷，放鬆一下來趟金山一日遊吧～
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Jinshan Old Street in Taipei

strIntroduction: 秋意正凉时，泡完温泉，享用万里仙境会馆的「万里蟹海鲜锅」正刚好，万里仙境会馆每天有配合的船家送来最新鲜的海鲜，秋蟹正肥美的季节，此为2016年北海岸温泉美食嘉年华特别行程。
strTitle: 【今宴北海岸】万里仙境温泉会馆「双人蜜月汤屋＋万里蟹海鲜锅」

strIntroduction: 苗栗除了有四方牧場以及浪漫的薰衣草花園，還有全台唯一的湖中島-日新島!快來趟戶外之旅吧~
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Fourway Ranch Farm and Lavender Cottage

strIntroduction: 秀姑巒溪河型變化多端，KKDAY安排小型獨木舟的新穎玩法，讓您能體驗一路顛頗，急流湧進的快感!
strTitle: Xiugumi Creek's 4 Hour Rapids Challenge, Hualian

strIntroduction: 除了租摩托車之外，墾丁街車也是暢遊墾丁的另一個好選擇，對沒有駕照或路不熟的遊客，是最方便也最省錢的方式走遍墾丁。
strTitle: Kenting Express Line round-trip bus tickets and Kenting 2-day shuttle bus pass

strIntroduction: 由台東在地人帶您深度瀏覽台東在地人文化。輕輕轉動電動的油門，沒有燥動的引擎聲，只剩微風和喜悅在心頭，穿過老舊的鐵軌改裝的鐵馬隧道，穿過日常累積的勞累，放空一切，讓這一刻，讓每一顆細胞全新的活著。
strTitle: 【台東在地輕旅行】台東電動車半日遊
Beitus Spring City Resort Spring House for 2 hours and Set Meal for 2

strIntroduction: Taiwan High Speed Railway 20% Off e-ticket，Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Hsinchu

strIntroduction: 鹿港小鎮，充滿濃濃的古早味及人情味。著名的天后宮、鹿港小吃都是必遊景點之一。還有，別忘了來體驗「摸乳巷」，就像時光走廊，回到過去的鹿港。
strTitle: Half Day Trip to Lukang Old Street, Gentleman Alley and Lungshan Temple in Changhua

strIntroduction: There is no need to go far to appreciate the autumn leaves. Visit the secret scenic spot with autumn leaves everywhere in Taipei.
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Yangmingshan and Tamsui

strIntroduction: 造訪陽明山觀賞季節限定的花景！不需擔心，因為一年四季皆有不同景致。接著，來到有「鬼湖」之稱的北投地熱谷，感受北投溫泉的獨特之處。
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Yangmingshan and Geothermal hot springs in Beitou

strIntroduction: 早上安排莫那魯道抗日紀念公園走走看看，下午到清境農場青青草原在壯闊的草園上吹風看綿羊、老英格蘭莊園吃吃下午茶，kkday帶您輕鬆玩台中~
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Sheepshearing at Green Grass Grassland in Cingjing Farm

strIntroduction: 台北人的熱門私房景點-金山老街，你可以去欣賞北海岸風景，逛逛金包里老街，這邊也有著名的金山溫泉，快來一起遊北海岸！
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Jinshan Old Street

strIntroduction: 佛陀紀念館內有八座宏偉的八座寶塔、精美的白象雄獅石雕，還有超好玩的4D電影，欣賞電影還能了解佛陀的中心思想~ 旗山老街楊桃杏仁露，香蕉皮牛奶、麵線糊...等等的小吃，便宜又好吃，等你來親自認證!
strTitle: 6-Hour Taxi Tour to Foguangshan Buddhist Monestary and Cishan Old Street in Kaohsiung

strIntroduction: A fantastic trip to Alishan in the Autumn! We will take you to the mountain top to admire the maple trees, drink tea, and visit Fen Qi lake, where you will be able to explore the old street.
strTitle: 10-Hour Taxi Tour to Maple trees and local tea on Alishan

strIntroduction: 當在國內旅遊或出國旅行、經商，面對各種不確定的環境因素，除了隨身行囊外，您投保旅行平安險了嗎？
strTitle: 【線上投保】台灣自由行旅遊平安險-投保金額2000萬NTD （不限國籍）

strIntroduction: 早上先到台中國家歌劇院及新社古堡莊園，沉浸在藝文氣息當中，下午再到百菇莊採菇、薰衣草森林散步，台中就該這樣玩!
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Xinshe Castle and mushroom delicacies at Baigu Mushroom Farm

strIntroduction: 看見台灣南投好風光!日月潭遊湖之旅加上在中台禪寺內隨意漫遊，隨著kkday尋幽探訪南投吧~
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Sun Moon Lake and Xuanguang Temple

strIntroduction: 偶而該離開都市，來一趟鄉間小旅行吧！一起放慢腳步，慢活生活。
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Panoramic at Xiaowulai Sky Walk

strIntroduction: 位於台灣最南端的恆春半島，充滿了驚豔的地理變化，有最專業的的導覽人員，帶您體驗不一樣的恆春半島。
strTitle: Half Day Tour to Kenting's Longpan, Eluanbi Park and Chuanfan Rock

strIntroduction: 知名的阿里山有令人沉醉的櫻花花海、秋日楓紅，更有並列阿里山五奇的日出、神木、雲海、晚霞及鐵道。
strTitle: Tour to Alishan National Scenic Area

strIntroduction: 來台必遊景點之ㄧ，故宮博物館與原住民博物館聯合票開賣摟～一次逛完兩大博物館，一次滿足你的需求～
strTitle: Ticket Combo: National Palace Museum and Shung Ye Museum of Formosan Aborigines

strIntroduction: 花蓮萬榮溫泉泉池分為二處，一池呈現寶藍色一池則是赤紅色，所以又稱鴛鴦溫泉，是不是心動想來一探究竟了呢~
strTitle: Yuanyang Hotspring and Upstream Creek Trek, Hualien

strIntroduction: 台灣兩大景點直達直送～不用轉車辛勞、不用等車煩惱，自由行、環島行，最聰明的選擇～
strTitle: Cingjing to Sun Moon Lake Transfers

strIntroduction: 台灣七大美景之一-日月潭是每位旅客到台中必遊之地。現在KKday提供清境各民宿出發、台中市區結束的日月潭半日遊共乘車，一次走完台中兩大景點，讓你的台灣旅行更精彩。
strTitle: 【清境出發、回送台中】日月潭半日遊

strIntroduction: KKday帶你遊美濃，深入體驗客家生活和原住民園區～
strTitle: 1-Day tour to Meinong hakka village in Kaohsiung

strIntroduction: 假日休閒好去處，出去走走最方邊的選擇～來KKday帶你去高雄在地人的午後秘密基地～
strTitle: 1-Day Buddha Culture experience Tour to Fo Guang Shan and Lotus Lake of Kaohsiung

strIntroduction: 史上最威，台灣唯一珊瑚礁小島-小琉球。美麗景色，無法文字形容，一起與KKday去一趟琉球之旅吧～
strTitle: Day tour to liuqiu island

strIntroduction: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Off e-ticket, Save up time & money with our High-Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Tainan

strIntroduction: Taitung is a vast area with not a lot of public transportation available. Thus if you only have 1 day to spare and you want to take a trip to visit the Luye Gaotai Hot Air balloon area, Mr Brown Area and more as well as taking in the scenery along the coastal road, Sanxiantai and Little Yehliu, the travel time will take up too much of your precious time. Instead, choose our 8 hour chartered car service and pick the attractions of your choice, a guaranteed way of making full use of your only day in Taitung!
strTitle: 8-Hour Chartered Day Tour to Taitung

strIntroduction: 這輩子除了軍訓課或當兵外，是不是沒機會再體驗打靶的刺激了呢? 這次，除了能體驗超刺激的打靶外，還有專業教練能在旁指導，好玩又刺激!
strTitle: Skeet Shooting with Live Ammunition (10 shots) in Kenting
